statements: SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions;
SELECT decision_id, landmark_case_name, court_name, decision_date FROM landmark_court_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT plaintiffs, defendants FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT landmark_case_name AS 'Case', judge_name AS 'Presiding Judge' FROM landmark_court_decisions;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE judge_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC, judge_name ASC
SELECT decision_id, court_name, plaintiffs, defendants FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE plaintiffs LIKE '%Smith%' OR defendants LIKE '%Johnson%'
SELECT court_name, judge_name, plaintiffs, defendants FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC
SELECT landmark_case_name, court_name, plaintiffs, defendants, case_summary FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE plaintiffs = 'ABC Corp' AND defendants = 'XYZ Inc'
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE plaintiffs = 'John Doe' AND defendants = 'Jane Doe' ORDER BY decision_date ASC
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE importance_level = 'High';
SELECT landmark_name, jurisdiction FROM landmarks ORDER BY court DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE id = 3;
SELECT landmark_name, decision_date, jurisdiction FROM landmarks WHERE jurisdiction = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT DISTINCT jurisdiction FROM landmarks ORDER BY 1;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE decision_date > '2021-01-01' AND jurisdiction = 'New York' ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT landmark_name, jurisdiction, importance_level FROM landmarks WHERE court > 100 ORDER BY court ASC;
SELECT landmark_name, analysis_date FROM landmarks l JOIN case_analysis ca ON l.id = ca.landmark_id WHERE ca.researcher_id = 123 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT jurisdiction, COUNT(*) AS count FROM landmarks GROUP BY jurisdiction HAVING count > 2 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT l.landmark_name, ca.analysis_details FROM landmarks l LEFT JOIN case_analysis ca ON l.id = ca.landmark_id WHERE ca.researcher_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, date_decided FROM landmark_court_decisions ORDER BY date_decided DESC;
SELECT argument_text FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_type = 'Defense';
SELECT research_topic, findings FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT case_name, court, date_decided, summary FROM landmark_court_decisions;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, court FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE date_decided > '2022-01-01';
SELECT argument_text, argument_type FROM legal_arguments WHERE case_id = '7f94be6f-7f8b-4f0b-a3a9-09bc7cb8110b';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT case_name, summary FROM landmark_court_decisions ORDER BY date_decided DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights;
SELECT decision_id, case_name FROM landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights WHERE landmark_decision = TRUE;
SELECT court_name, decision_date FROM landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT party_type, COUNT(*) as party_count FROM parties GROUP BY party_type ORDER BY party_count DESC;
SELECT judge_name, years_on_bench FROM judges WHERE years_on_bench > 10;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights;
SELECT case_name, decision_date FROM landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights WHERE landmark_decision = true;
SELECT * FROM judges ORDER BY years_on_bench DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT counsel_name, specialization, law_firm FROM legal_counsel WHERE specialization = 'Human Rights';
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions;
SELECT case_name, court, decision_date FROM landmark_court_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, court_name, years_on_bench FROM judges WHERE years_on_bench > 10;
SELECT lawyer_name, law_firm, speciality FROM lawyers WHERE speciality = 'Criminal Law';
SELECT party_name, role, attorney_id FROM parties WHERE role = 'Plaintiff' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE court = 'Supreme Court' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, verdict, overview FROM landmark_court_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT judge_name, court_name, years_on_bench FROM judges WHERE years_on_bench > 10 ORDER BY years_on_bench DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, law_firm, speciality FROM lawyers WHERE speciality = 'Criminal Law';
SELECT party_name, role, attorney_id FROM parties WHERE role = 'Plaintiff';
